title: Musk's $1m-a-day to swing states voters 'deeply concerning'
summary: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has said he will give away $1m (£766,000) a day to a registered voter in key swing states until the US presidential election on 5 November. The winner will be chosen at random from those who sign a pro-US Constitution petition by Mr Musk’s campaign group America PAC, which he set up to support Republican nominee Donald Trump's bid to return to the White House. Only registered voters in swing states, which is what makes it illegal," said Mr Hasen, a professor at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) law school. "I haven't followed that," he said, adding that he speaks to Mr Musk often and he is a "friend". The is
